sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData"; function post(props) { var username=()=>{ return Users[props.postData.userId]; } return (
{username.username} {props.postData.date}
{props?.postData.desc}
{props.postData.like} people like it
{props.postData.comment} comments
) } export default post
